attributes.action: Stop Network Rail's plans to build in our Green Belt Valley between Swallownest, Beighton, Woodhouse, Woodhouse Mill and Fence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Network Rail should not be allowed to build their National Engineering Centre on Green Belt which doubles as a flood plain.  This will: bring noise pollution; air pollution from the 7 chimneys; traffic congestion; engulf the valley; effect the flood plain; effect the wildlife on the marsh; effect the nearby farms; effect the trans pennine trail; etc.  For more information please visit Sheffield Council website - application no 07/06020/FUL
